definition: to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
to give or have an injection
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
lit. to draw blood on the first prick (idiom)/fig. to hit the nail on the head
fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
lit. to see a gap and stick in a needle (idiom); fig. to make use of every second and every inch
major policy of the national government

sentences.english: The F14 offers compact package dimensions and a pluggable pin header.
sentences.chinese: 在女性14例提供了紧凑的封装尺寸和可插入针。

sentences.english: Fixation pins were placed in the 2 3 metacarpal and radial shaft.
sentences.chinese: 外固定针固定在2～3掌骨和桡骨干上。

sentences.english: Booksewing needle for the MARTINI, ASTER sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 马天尼阿斯达锁线机专用针。

sentences.english: Conclusion Balancing acupuncture is superior to conventional acupuncture in treating stiff neck.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察平衡针配合运动疗法治疗落枕临床疗效。

sentences.english: Smith also designed a special needle and a needle sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯也设计了一个特殊的针和一个注射针研磨器。

sentences.english: I need a needle and some thread to mend this shirt with.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根针和一些线缝补这件衬衫。

sentences.english: Eventually, metal needles began to appear and these took their place.
sentences.chinese: 后来，金属针的出现取代了石针和瓷针。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss application of pulse type tube in vein infusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脉冲式封管在静脉留置针输液中的应用。

sentences.english: On its face, it has three hands. One is short, the other two are long.
sentences.chinese: 其上有三根针，一根短，另两根长。
这幅图描绘了一个四叉电极针。

sentences.english: Knitting mistakes can be corrected by taking stitches out one-at-a-time for the sake of security.
sentences.chinese: 针织错误可以纠正了一个在给时为安全起见，采取针。

sentences.english: The IV also allows for easier administration of Pitocin should labor need to be augmented.
sentences.chinese: 留置针还使得在临盆中需要增加催产素时便于管理。

sentences.english: Zhang took out needle and line taking a closer look, and finally found a hole behind the needle.
sentences.chinese: 张飞拿出针与线左看右看，终于发现了针后面的小孔。

sentences.english: The floor covering is an anthracite needle felt.
sentences.chinese: 地板覆盖是无烟煤针感觉。

sentences.english: HE pricked tHE blister on his HEel with a sterilized needle.
sentences.chinese: 他用一根消过毒的针扎破脚后跟上的水泡。

sentences.english: Many people believe that chickens peck the ground to search for the magic needle.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为，鸡啄地面搜寻魔术针。

definition: to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
to give or have an acupuncture treatment
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
medical puncture to extract bodily fluid (a tap)/body piercing/puncture
